pages.text: HUAJI, one of the origin of the world, this substance is distributed in all things in the universe, but it exists only in a very low concentration, which is difficult to extract directly.According to the latest tieba geology, these comical crystals appear to have been transformed by HUAJI-rich seawater and groundwater deposited underground over hundreds of millions of years.

pages.title: HUAJI Fragment
pages.text: Accumulated in the depths of the earth, the HUAJI-rich stone flakes can be heated directly to extract the HUAJI due to its high boiling point at a high concentration.

pages.title: HUAJI
pages.text: The form of HUAJI naturally crystallized in normal temperature has become an inexhaustible source of art for artists for thousands of years.
